name: nacelle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a cover that holds engines, fuel, and equipment on an aircraft but is separate from the fuselage (= the main body of an aircraft): The design of the aircraft has been modified and the engine nacelles now encase the entire engine.
balhash/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesWorkers at the plant connect the nacelles to the engines.We recognized that there are fundamental problems with the hydraulics in the nacelle.A chafed hydraulic line hidden deep in the nacelle started the chain of events that led to the crash.
